rukus.text: 77|41|Omo o osoreru mono wa, hontoni (suzushi) kage to izumi no ma ni irudarou.
77|42|Kare-ra ga hossuru, subete no kajitsu (o eru).
77|43|`Kokoronosokokara manzoku shite tabe katsu nome, anata gata (no yoi) okonai o shita koto ni taishite.'(To ware wa iou. )
77|44|Kono yo ni ware wa, yoi okonai no mono-tachi ni mukuiru.
77|45|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|46|(Anata gata fugi no mono yo. ) `Shibashi no ma tabe katsu kyoraku suruga i. Hontoni anata gata wa tsumibukaimonodearu.'
77|47|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|48|Kare-ra wa,`ritsurei 〔rukuu〕 seyo.' To iwa rete mo ryurei shinai.
77|49|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|50|Kono (kuruan) o sashioite, don'na oshie o kare-ra wa shinjiyou to suru no ka.
